mapper.select: select image_url, brand_name, product_size_id, to_date(biddings.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), status.name from wishlists join products using (product_id) join product_sizes using (product_id) join brands using (brand_id) join biddings on (productSizeCode = product_size_id) join bidding_positions on (bidding_position_id = bidding_positions.id) join status on (status_id = status.id) where wishlists.member_id = #{member_id} and bidding_positions.position = '구매자'
